Product Description

MUYI 20 PIECES DECORATION STRIP, personalized decor for your car vent outlet. Makes your car interior atmosphere stylish and brightly; gives you an enjoyable driving experience!

Decoration Trim Product Size Measuring 7.68″ in length, 0.16″ in widith, 0.3″ in heigth.

Perfect selection for Mother’s Day, Birthday, Christmas, Valentine day, Wedding, and New Year.

MUYI 20 PIECES AIR OUTLET TRIM Features

Soft PVC, electroplated processU-shaped design, tighten automaticallyFree cuttingWaterproof and Sun CareMultiple color options20pcs per package Attention PLEASE!

PLEASE MAKE SURE IF ITS COMPATIBLE BEFORE PURCHASED!

Effect display

The front grille is mundane and boring before install the MUYI shiny decoration trim.

Effect display

The air outlet is upscale and full of atmosphere after installation.

Effect display

The front grille is mundane and boring before install the MUYI shiny decoration trim.

Effect display

The front grille is full of personality and dazzling after installation.

ONLY SUITABLE FOR STRIP AIR OUTLETS!! PLEASE DOUBLE CONFIRM BEFORE PURCHASED!!!

Horizontal Vent

Suitable for horizontal vents.

Vertical Vent

Suitable for 90% of vertical vents with no curves.

Horizontal Round Vent

Only fit for vents with flat and straight fan blades.

NONE OF THE FOLLOWING AIR OUTLETS ARE SUITABLE!! PLEASE DOUBLE CONFIRM BEFORE PURCHASED!!!

Irregular Round Vent

Not suitable for irregular round vent with no fan blades.

Round Vent

Not suitable for round vent with curvy fan blades.

Irregular Round Vent

Not suitable for round vents with fixed inner circles.

STEP FOR INSTALLATION

Length
7.68 inches 7.68 inches 7.68 inches

Width
0.16 inches 0.16 inches 0.16 inches

Height
0.3 inches 0.3 inches 0.3 inches

Personalized Decor – Those 20-pieces shiny decoration strip makes your car interior atmosphere stylish and brightly; gives you an enjoyable driving experience.
Durable Quality – Made of high quality PVC material in Plating Effect. MUYI car vent strim accessory features with waterproof, corrosion resistant, bendable, can be used for a long time without worry of breakdown, fade and scratch.
Universal Design – U-shaped design, seamlessly fits. Measuring 7.68″ in length, 0.16″ in widith, 0.3″ in heigth. Suitable for straight air vent outlet grille type, as you can see from photo, not suitable for arc, curve or round type. PLEASE MAKE SURE IF ITS COMPATIBLE BEFORE PURCHASED!
Handy Operation – Convenient and easy to use. Step 1, you need to Wipe clean the outlet before installation. Step 2, measure and compare the size, use scissor to cut the length that match the air outlet. Step 3, open the strip and snap on the air vent outlet.
Package Include – Pack of 20 pieces car vent outlet trims. Make your car interior more sparkling and stylish. It also a perfect gifts for Mother’s Day, Birthday, Christmas, Valentine day, Wedding, and New Year.

item.title: Best Pet Supplies Dog Poop Bag Holder Leash Attachment, Color, Reusable Mesh Dispenser Pouch for Travel, Walking, Park, and Outdoor Use, Soft and Durable with Clip-On – Mesh Purple
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) HEAVY-DUTY BAGS DESIGNED WITH MOTHER NATURE IN MIND Looking for heavy-duty dog poop bags that don’t easily break? Smarter waste bags that you can confidently toss in the trash? Then you’ll love our new and improved doggy bags! We went back to the drawing board and created extra-strong leak-proof bags ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $9.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:02:42 UTC – Details)


HEAVY-DUTY BAGS DESIGNED WITH MOTHER NATURE IN MIND

Looking for heavy-duty dog poop bags that don’t easily break?

Smarter waste bags that you can confidently toss in the trash?

Then you’ll love our new and improved doggy bags!

We went back to the drawing board and created extra-strong leak-proof bags made using a
special ingredient. The secret behind this smart technology? A certified additive known as d2w.
It shortens the life of our bags at the end of its useful life when it ends up in the open
environment.

So you get to throw your pet’s waste without destroying the environment.

Here are more reasons you’ll love these strong poop bags:

  • – Made with 15 microns-thick plastic for greater strength.
  • – Well-sealed seams prevent the bags from ripping.

– The opaque design masks the contents of the bags.- Scented with a jasmine fragrance that keeps odor at bay.- Very easy to separate from the roll thanks to high-quality perforations.- Sized at 13” (L) x 9” (H) to handle poop from all breeds.- They leave you enough room at the top to create a knot.- Backed by a 100.

Go ahead, get heavy-duty biodegradable poop bags that you can toss guilt-free!
Is Discontinued By Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ No
Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 6.97 x 5.12 x 2.76 inches; 1.19 Pounds
Item model number ‏ : ‎ PH-240T
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ July 8, 2016
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Best Pet Supplies, Inc.
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B01HIM19HK
Country of Origin ‏ : ‎ China

Environmentally Friendly Degradable Plastic – Our pet waste bags are infused with a D2W additives which helps them break down more quickly than traditional plastics, which makes them more eco-friendly if they do reach a landfill
Quick Cleanup Made Easy – Our versatile doggy poop bags are thicker, more durable, and feature easy-tear perforations to make it easier to pull a single one away from the roll. This means less time standing around and more time cleaning up
Supports Small to Large Breed Dogs – These degradable dog poop bags are 13” x 9” in size which make it easier to pick up and safely store messy feces and deposits for all types of breeds, including chihuahuas to boxers to Labradors
Trusted Quality Assurance – Here at Best Pet Supplies we make pet poop bags and pet accessories that support owners and their four-legged friends. If you have any questions, please reach out and we’ll provide fast, reliable support

Read more

Lightly Scented

Our doggie poop bags are lightly scented to help mask those smelly odors. This is especially important if you need to walk some distance before you find a trash can or have to keep it in the car until you get home.

Fun Colors & Patterns

Who said poop bags have to be totally gross? We offer doggie poop bags in a variety of pet and owner-friendly colors including pink hearts, cute paws, bones and much more!

Thicker & Resilient Bags

Standard poop bags often tear or leak, especially if you have a larger dog. We’ve made our plastic bags 15 microns thick to withstand those late-night poop walks, dog park excited poops and all the other messy situations a pet owner winds up in.

Easy-Tear Perforations

Every bag is cleanly perforated and easy to tear off from the roll. The opaque design masks the contents of the bags. Try our dog waste bag dispensers to keep them on hand when it is needed!

Read more





Waste Bags
Pet Wipes
Puppy Training Pads
Puppy Training Pads
Dispenser & Leash Set
Dispenser & Leash Set
Features Leak-proof Refill Bags that are ready to go when your pup is Extra-strong Pet Wipes with a gentle plant-derived formula for a residue-free clean Super absorbent Puppy Training Pads convert liquid to gel and protect your floors Super absorbent Puppy Training Pads convert liquid to gel and protect your floors All weather dispenser and leash set. Small, Compact, and Lightweight Plastic Poop Bag Holder All weather dispenser and leash set. Small, Compact, and Lightweight Mesh Poop Bag Holder
Available 150 Bags, 240 Bags, 360 Bags, 900 Bags 100 Wipes, 400 Wipes 100 Pads, 300 Pads, 400 Pads 100 Pads, 300 Pads, 400 Pads

5

item.content:encoded:
Price: $18.99 - $12.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:27:30 UTC – Details)

From the brand

YATOJUZI

In Life, You find us a special friend. This will be our great honor.

YATOJUZI is a brand about developing and designing healing crystals , leading the trend in Europe and America; We are dedicated to helping everyone who is stressed in modern society find peace and energy.

We adhere to the business philosophy of “Customer experience first” and the business principle of “Quality first, Integrity first”.We hope to bring customers a comfortable and enjoyable experience and add happiness and joy to their lives.

Source:

In the 21st century, there is a girl who often feels various pressures from work and life, She often felt lost and powerless, At this time she always wanted to hold on something. She hopes to get energy from it to support her. By a chance, she got a worry Stone made of healing crystal. From then on, whenever she felt stressed or sad, she would hold this crystal and rub it. She was surprised to find that her heart gradually calmed down.

The brand “YATOJUZI “was born.

She developed a strong interest in healing crystals, and began to study healing crystals and decided to recommend them to more people.

Crystals and Healing Stones

Healing Crystals

Healing Crystal for Meditation

The more often you program the crystal with this meditation the stronger it’s healing energy will be.

Healing Crystal to divine.

Since crystal divination connects you to your higher self, it can help stimulate your intuition.

Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 2.36 x 1.97 x 1.26 inches; 2.4 Ounces
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ September 16, 2022
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ YATOJUZI
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B09XQR7HVJ

[Elephant Symbolize ]:Elephants are revered as a symbol of good luck, prosperity, destroyer of evil, remover of obstacles, as well as strength, power, wisdom, memory, vitality, and gentle soul in a mammoth body.
[Powerful Intellect]The presence of an elephant in your life, whether in real life, the media, or elsewhere, can be a sign of wisdom for you to solve a problem or overcome an obstacle that may be in front of you. While you may feel incredibly emotional about a particular situation, you have a rational mind and are able to make logical decisions.
[Amethyst]:This purple stone is said to be incredibly protective, healing, and purifying. It’s claimed it can help rid the mind of negative thoughts and bring forth humility, sincerity, and spiritual wisdom. It’s also said to help promote sobriety. Sleep is another claimed benefit of this stone, from supposedly aiding in insomnia relief to understanding dreams.
[ After service]: If you have any questions, please tell us , we shall solve for you asap.We hope that all customers who use our crystal can be healed and happy everyday.

Welcome to YATOJUZI！


2 Inch Natural Healing Crystal Stones Elephant Figurine Statue Hand Carved Gemstone Energy Balancing Luck Gifts Collection Decor for Home Office Desk

Introduction to Elephants

Cute Elephants

  • Elephants are the largest existing land animals.
  • Distinctive features of elephants include a long proboscis called a trunk, tusks, large ear flaps, pillar-like legs, and tough but sensitive skin.

Elephant lifestyle

  • Elephants have a fission–fusion society, in which multiple family groups come together to socialise. .
  • Males leave their family groups when they reach puberty and may live alone or with other males.

What do elephants symbolize?

Elephants are revered as a symbol of good luck, prosperity, destroyer of evil, remover of obstacles, as well as strength, power, wisdom, memory, vitality, and gentle soul in a mammoth body.

Suitable Occasion

Pocket Stone

2 inch suite be a pocket stone, perfect size in your palm and easy to carry for pocket or handbag to bring you peace, fortune and positive energy.

Gift Idea

This is a perfect gift all you love, a wonderful Christmas gifts, birthday gift, Housewarming gift for you, your families and your friends.

Desk Decor

Place it on your office desk can attract the positive energy to improve your wealth and lucky in your daily work.

Touching

An elephant symbolizes the ability to draw money from outside.Touching an elephant's trunk can bring money to your life or business.

Different materials have different benefits!!

    Amethyst is said to be incredibly protective, healing, and purifying.It can help rid the mind of negative thoughts and bring forth humility, sincerity, and spiritual wisdom and promote sobriety.

    It is all about love. It help restore trust and harmony in all different kinds of relationships while improving close connections. It also encourage love, respect, trust, and worth within one’s self.

    It provides strength, confidence, courage, and happiness. It renews optimism for life and pushes us to take action to acquire. It urges to get out of their comfort zone and take on new opportunities.

Warranty & Support

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $86.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:20:11 UTC – Details)

Product Description

Please Read Before Purchase!

Please Confrim Your SIM Card’s Compatibility Before Purchasing!

2G GSM: B2/B3/B5/B83G WCDMA: B1/B2/B5/B8Ulefone Note 6 Does NOT work with AT&T, Cricket or CDMA Carriers such as Verizon, Sprint, Boost Mobile, Straight Talk or U.S.Cellular!It CAN work with GSM Carriers like T-mobile, Metro PCS, H2O Wireless …!

Note:

It will be smoother to use after booting a few minutes.If the elderly use it and need a larger display font, the font can be set to the largest in the background, which is convenient for the elders to use. At the same time, the mobile phone has a children space mode. It can limit the usage time, mobile data and apps, no need to worry that kids will indulge in games, protect their eyes as well.Due to the small memory of the Note 6 cell phone, please close unused programs in time to get a better user experience. For example, when you are not using GPS positioning, please turn it off, then you can get a longer standby experience.

Notice:

If your phone can’t work any other carriers at the first time, you need to activate the sim card on a existing phone which is support you carrier. After you receive the initial activation texts or get 3G signal, put the sim card back into the phone It should automatically pick up the carrier’s network. Or you can contact with the carrier to activate your SIM card.If your Ulefone note 6 can’t connect to data, please input the APN setting by manually, first input Operator SIM and go to settings—>Network&internet—>Moblile network—>Advanced—>Access point Names—>here can be add APN(the‘+’ icon) or change the APN (Edit any access point to change). To find APN parameters you need to manual input, you may ask the shop / website of those Operators, or you can find another handset with a correct working sim card inserted, then use the same path same approach, you can find and read the APN characters of this Operator, and then copy the same character into your note 6.

Note: Please open the back cover of the phone and remove the insulating tape on battery before starting to use. Otherwise unable to charge!

Nano sim*1 + Nano sim*1 + TF card*1Dual SIM Dual Standby128GB extra storage added via TF card(If you received the phone without insulating tape, that’s because the factory has removed the insulating tape from the battery before shipped.)

Super lightweight and compact, weights only 155g and 8.5mm thickness, golden weight ratio creates excellent holding experience, provide compact and well-balanced look and feel. Hold it in hand comfortably and carry it around with ease.

RAM/ROM: 1GB/32GB (Max. Expansion 128GB)CPU: SC7731E, Quad-core 1.3GHzGPU: Mali-T820 up to 600MHzUSB: Micro USB 5 PinMusic Format Supported: MP3, AMR, AAC, FLACImage Format Supported: BMP, GIF, JPG, PNGDimensions (inch): 6.1″*2.87“*0.33”Weight: 155g/0.34lb

6.1 Inch Water-drop In-cell Full ScreenIPS Screen720*1560 High ResolutionFullview Display92.9% Screen Ratio19:5:9 Aspect RatioSmoother Screen Sensitivity

See The World Through HD Camera

5MP Main Rear Camera

Capturing staggeringly beautiful landscape is a great enjoyment, Note 6 equipped with 5MP main rear camera up to F/2.2 aperture has exceptional vision, helping you discover unusual beauty and assisting you record every beautiful moment for lasting forever.

Superb Front Camera Rejuvenates Your Image with Beauty Mode

2MP camera with HDR and beautify function in the front interprets your features thoroughly and beautifully so as to generate stunning selfies. Whether it is against the background of the mottled tree shadows during the day or the city lights at night, a relaxing shot can amaze your protagonist moments.

Night Mode

Regardless of Light or Shade, The Beauty is Always Clear and Moving

Turn on the night scene mode to automatically optimize the shooting effect, so that the details of the photo are deep and the scene is clear and bright, shooting clear and stereoscopic masterpiece for you.

Latest Android 11 Go Edition OS

Your trendy Note 6 Unlocked Cell Phones, it will run smooth and fast based on Android 11 Go OS out of box, bringing a powerful and smooth experience. Application startup speed has been greatly improved, new privacy protection mechanism adopted will protect your privacy and security.

Mighty Quad-core Processor

Powered by powerful processor with 1GB of RAM + 32GB ROM of internal storage that can deliver sufficient performance for all your apps to run smoothly. Be amazed by the outstanding graphics performance GPU that helps output unparalleled images.

3300mAh Long-lasting Battery

Note 6 equipped with 3300mAh battery makes you know what is last endurance, there is less power consumption even you immerse yourself into hearty games and binge-watching.

Definitely Household Scissors — Great for cutting burlap, paper, card stock, cardboard, wrapping paper, light line, fabric, tape, photos, coupons, and opening boxes & packaging. Surprised for sewing, tailoring, quilting, dressmaking, cutting patterns, cutting quilting, Vinyl, Leather, and making face masks. Exceptional scissors for multiple uses in various rooms, in the Handcraft Workshop, bathroom, sewing room, laundry room, craft room, at the office, great for most regular household tasks.
3 Pairs of Quality Straight Handled Scissors — They strongly allow you to make precise cuts with great control as the blade has the perfect amount of friction, which is very comfortable to use. 3 pairs of straight handled scissors for smooth, efficient cutting scissors for general use. Suitable for teachers’ middle/high school classroom supplies.
Sharp and Durable — Durable stainless steel blades enable high-density steel that makes it 3 times harder than normal stainless steel and is smoother cutting. 6 X longer lasting than the previous formula and remain sharp for 100,000 + cuts. Blades stay sharper longer; We chose bright colors, green/purple/orange. Different color rubber handles are used in different places, Soft-grip holes let you maintain a comfortable, can be used left- or right-handed.
iBayam 8-Inch Soft-Grip Scissors — 3 special scissors are suitable for most items that need to be cut. It can also be used as household scissors for cutting open frozen food bags ready for cooking. Convenient, sturdy, especially sharp scissors for general use, and very durable.

From the brand

Ulefone Note Series

Ulefone Armor Series

Ulefone Armor X Series

Ulefone Accessories

How did we get our start?

As early as 2010, with the idea of helping people stay in close contact with others, we started designing and manufacturing feature phones, and then expanded differentiated smartphones.

Why do we love what we do?

Technology makes life easier and more fun. It’s the millions of Ulefone users around the globe who like our products and inspire us every day.

What makes our products unique?

Every Ulefone product is made with care, and every detail counts to impress our customers. We value innovation, listen to the needs of users, focus on the latest technology.

6.1” HD+ water-drop display screen, perfect with one-hand set. 155g featherweight, 8.5MM Ultra-slim cellphone.
3 independent card slots for 1* Nano SIM, 1* Nano SIM, 1* TF card(up to 128GB). Note: Please remove the insulating tape before starting up the phone for the first time!
5MP main camera and 2MP front camera
Bands: 2G GSM B2/3/5/8, 3G WCDMA B1/2/5/8, Not 4G. Compatible with most of GSM Carriers such as T-Mobile, Metro Pcs and others. Not compatible with AT&T, Cricket or CDMA carriers such as Sprint & Verizon. This is a 3G smartphone, not 4G. Check compatibility with your local bands before purchase

IMPORTANT NOTES(Please Read Before Purchase!):

Ulefone Note 6 Does NOT work with AT&T, Cricket or CDMA Carriers such as Verizon, Sprint, Boost Mobile, Straight Talk or U.S.Cellular!

It CAN work with GSM Carriers like T-mobile, Metro PCS and others!

Please Confirm Your SIM Card’s frequency bands are included in below Supported Bands Before Order:

  • 2G GSM: B2/B3/B5/B8
  • 3G WCDMA: B1/B2/B5/B8

Please kindly note that the Note 6 is designed as a very cheap and basic phone. Therefor it has only 1GB RAM and 32GB ROM. So the speed is slower than other smartphones with 2GB RAM or 4GB RAM.

The Ulefone Note 6 unlocked cell phone is designed as a value-for-money basic smartphone for everyone. Defiantly is the most perfect value-for-money gift for every kids, teenagers, friends, parents and people who never use a smart mobile phone before.

  • These features make the Note 6 stand out from other 3G entry-level smartphones:
  1. Superior to the U-NOTCH SCREEN: Equipped with a 6.1″ Water-drop IPS screen, it produces a 92% contrast ratio, 19.2:9 wide screen display, producing a Full View display.
  2. Better than a DUAL CARD SLOT phone: The TRIPLE card slots allow you to use 1* Nano SIM, 1* Nano SIM and 1* Micro SD (TF) card simultaneously.
  3. Better than a SINGLE SIM phone: The Note 6 is a Dual SIM and Dual Standby unlocked cell phone.
  4. Face Recognition: Get access into your phone quickly. Safe and convenient.
  5. Ultra-Slim Lightweight: Fell more comfortable in your hand.
  6. 3300mAh Battery: With power saving function and optimization of Android 11. You use your phone longer than other phones.
  7. FORGET the EU PLUG: Your package comes with a US plug.
  8. FORGET that CHEAP Transparent SILICONE CASE: Your phone comes with a free but high quality TPU case which would be very expensive if bought separately.
  9. Global 2G and 3G frequency bands: You can take the Note 6 with you anywhere worldwide, as long as the area supports 2G and 3G(does not support Verizon and Sprint in US).
  10. Advanced certifications: CE, RoHS, TAC IMEI, MSDS UN38.3 certificated. Quality is confirmed by these government authorized institutions.
  • What makes us stand out from other sellers:
  1. If you buy a Ulefone smartphone from our Amazon store (Ulefone Direct- US), we will repair or replace any defective device during our one-year promise period.
  2. Our personal customer care support provides a friendly and quick response within 12 hours.

Your Cheapest 3G Phone with Fabulous Design

  • 6.1″ Water-drop Big Screen
  • 5MP + 2MP Camera
  • 3300mAh Battery
  • Quad-core CPU
  • 32GB Storage
  • Android 11 (GO Edition)

Your Cheapest 3G Phone with 3-Card Slot Design

  • Nano sim*1 + Nano sim*1 + TF card*1
  • Dual SIM Dual Standby
  • 128GB extra storage added via TF card

Note: Please remove the insulating tape before starting up the phone for the first time!

Your Cheapest 3G Phone with Wider Water-drop In-cell Full-screen

  • 6.1 Inch Water-drop In-cell Full Screen
  • IPS Screen
  • Fullview Display
  • 92.9% Screen Ratio
  • 19.2:9 All Screen Display
  • Smoother Screen Sensitivity
  • 3D Body Curves, Perfectly Suit
  • Slim, Compact Design and Light Weight

Your Cheapest 3G Phone with Android 11 OS

  • Powerful and smooth experience
  • New privacy protection mechanism

Complete and Compact Package of Features within a Single Phone

  • Quad-Core processor, 1GB RAM + 32GB ROM
  • OS: Android 11 Go Edition
  • 3300mAh long last battery ( supports DuraSpeed function to save power )
  • Face unlocking, 0.2s to get access
  • 3D Body curves
  • Hotspot & Tethering, Bluetooth
  • 2.4G Wi-Fi version: IEEE 802.11b / g / n
  • 3.5mm Audio jack
  • Gravity sensor, Proximity sensor, Light sensor
  • Emergency alerts
  • GPS & GLONASS & BeiDou triple navigation systems
  • Supports Whats App, Snapchat, Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, Spotify, YouTube, Prime Video, BBC iPlayer,TV Catchup and so on

Package List

  • 1 x Note 6 Smartphone
  • 1 x AC Power Charger(100~240V US plug)
  • 1 x Data Cable (100cm)
  • 1 x Protective Case
  • 1 x Protective Film
  • 1 x Multi-language User Manual
